attributes.action: Ban fireworks except organised public displays, on one day a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fireworks not only terrify animals, they can also terrify children, and elderly people.  Fireworks can be brought and let off any time of the year.  

Fireworks are very dangerous, and I have heard of fireworks being let off sideways in a park, and they can also set fire to trees, houses, and cause damage to cars, not to mention the harm it can do if it goes wrong and people are hurt by them.  They can be fatal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
